name: Ameya Retouch
author: Ameya

sections.description:
Retouch function

  • Resize to frequently used size
  • Image rotation
  • Adjust contrast and brightness
  • Blur any part
  • Change color temperature
sections.installation:
Admin Installer

  1. Visit WordPress admin screen, click “Plugins” -> “Add New” menu.
  2. Search for “ameya retouch” plugin from the list or search results.

OR…

  1. Click “Upload Plugin” button, upload your zip file.
  2. Click the “Install Now” button.
  3. Activate the plugin.

Manual

  1. Upload the Ameya Retouch folder to the plugins directory in your WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Why did you develop this plugin?

It was troublesome to launch Photoshop to make simple edits to the photos posted on the CMS.
sections.changelog:

  • FIXED: file location notation

0.2 – 2023-02

  • FIXED: ‘z-index’ of retouch stage’s background

0.1 – 2023-02

  • published!

short_description: This plugin retouches the images you upload.
description:
Retouch function

  • Resize to frequently used size
  • Image rotation
  • Adjust contrast and brightness
  • Blur any part
  • Change color temperature

upgrade_notice.0.1: Prepared the necessary functions and arranged the appearance of the plug-in.

screenshots.caption: Click "Media" -> "Retouch" menu. Design a retouch button from a "Retouch Settings" form.
Press the designed button to start retouching.
When the screen turns gray, drop the image file to load it, adjust the size or brightness, and press the save button. When all work is completed, press the close button to finish.
